entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce interface with static abstract BindAsync method for custom bound parameters of route handler delegates #40927
    .NET 7 Planning
  • URL Protocol Issue in the HTML Output with Razor Engine #40923
  • Don't invert the UseProgramMain option in project templates in Visual Studio #40917
    7.0-preview4
  • `JsonPatchDocument.ApplyTo` should support `DateOnly` data type #40916
  • Dev certificate inside docker container is not valid #40910
  • Is .net core compatible with IIS Webdav module ? #40903

Closed

  • W3CLogger tests pass despite using DateTime.Now instead of DateTime.UtcNow #40844
  • Add perf test for endpoint filter vs. no endpoint filter #40655
    7.0-preview3
  • Use top level statements option will be unlocalized in Visual Studio #40918
  • Add template option to generate explicit Program class with Main method instead of top-level statements #40877
    7.0-preview4
  • Ignore Null Properties #40751
  • IResult support in MVC #40639
    7.0-preview4
  • Syntax highlighting & Intellisense/code completion stops working on Blazor Razor components #40879
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • TypeScript break points not hit after moving corresponding js file out of wwwroot folder to an authorized folder #40889
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task #40198
    Backlog
  • WebApplicationOptions.WebRootPath is ignored if a wwwroot folder exists #40613
  • Razor error RZ2005 on one file (/pages/Error.cshtml) #40901

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement IProvideEndpointMetadata & IProvideEndpointParameterMetadata #40926
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime
  • Fix W3CLogger tests #40922
    area-runtime
  • Remove Mono specific Code #40920
    community-contribution
  • Add RouteHandlerContext as parameter to IRouteHandlerFilter.InvokeAsync #40919
    area-runtime
  • Fix Component Governance bugs #40915
  • RefactoringDictionaryHolderStruct #40909
    community-contribution
  • Add trimming guidance for developers #40902
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Skip failing test on redhat #40913
    area-security, 7.0-preview3
  • Use Microsoft.JSInterop to calculate package version #40921
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Prevent razor pages from being packed in UI nupkg #40839
    area-identity, 7.0-preview3
  • [Blazor] Cleanup DotnetDispatcher.cs #40906
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Add option to project templates to use Program.Main instead of top-level statements #40886
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Add option to enable binlogs for manual internal builds #40914
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-preview.4.22175.5 #40911
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Sync shared code from runtime #40890
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b007c54` to `af29db7` #40907
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Harden AssertRecycle #40878
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task (#40198) #40533
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40898
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Virtual method for OnCheckSlidingExpiration #40900
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add `AddStackExchangeRedisCache` & `AddHsts` overload #40689
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Unquarantine test #40888
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Increase a few IIS test timeouts #40884
    area-runtime
  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Trim Http.Extensions #40561
    area-runtime, community-contribution
